channel.title: Maltrail on Rohan Sharma
channel.description: Recent content in Maltrail on Rohan Sharma

item.title: Sau
item.description: Sau is an easy machine from hackthebox which involved exploiting a SSRF vulnerability leading to another service disclosure Maltrail. This service was vulnerable to command injection upon exploiting gave us shell as puma user. Upon further enumeration, systemctl can be run by puma user with root permissions.
